your printer is supported: http://hplipopensource.com/hplip-web/models/laserjet/hp_laserjet_1020.html - go to Ubuntu menu Applications > Accessories > Terminal and execute: sudo hp-setup
It will ask you for your password, type it there and press Enter
then allow it to download from the internet an add-on or firmware.. whatever it calls it, that should fix it
